# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)
project(main LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_executable(main "")
set_target_properties(main PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "main")
set_target_properties(main PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "bin")
add_dependencies(main cstructures cstruct_iterator)
target_include_directories(main PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(main PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(main PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(main PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE
    cstructures
    cstruct_iterator
)
target_link_directories(main PRIVATE
    temp_libs
    lib
)
target_link_options(main PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(main PRIVATE
    Demo/main.cpp
)

# target
add_library(cstructures STATIC "")
set_target_properties(cstructures PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cstructures")
set_target_properties(cstructures PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "temp_libs")
target_include_directories(cstructures PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(cstructures PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cstructures PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cstructures PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
target_link_options(cstructures PRIVATE
)
target_sources(cstructures PRIVATE
    src/tools_node.c
    src/tools_rbtree.c
)

# target
add_library(cstruct_iterator STATIC "")
set_target_properties(cstruct_iterator PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cstruct_iterator")
set_target_properties(cstruct_iterator PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "temp_libs")
target_include_directories(cstruct_iterator PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(cstruct_iterator PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cstruct_iterator PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cstruct_iterator PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
target_link_options(cstruct_iterator PRIVATE
)
target_sources(cstruct_iterator PRIVATE
    src/iterator/cstruct_iterator.cpp
)
